abstract.p: Correction of August 5 article on effort by Arab leaders to find consensus on outstanding differences between Palestinians and Israelis

block.p: Because of editing errors, an article on Saturday about an effort by Arab leaders to find a consensus on outstanding differences between the Palestinians and the Israelis misstated the Arab position on the issue of refugees. The Arab nations have long contended that Palestinian refugees are the responsibility of Israel, not of the rest of the world. The article also misstated the number of peace agreements signed by Israel with Arab countries. It is two -- not just with Egypt but also with Jordan.
